alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Iron; Kane; Piute; Sevier (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 02 at 10:40AM MDT until June 08 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Utah... Sevier River Near Hatch affecting Piute, Iron, Kane, Sevier and Garfield Counties. .Warm temperatures will continue to melt snowpack, causing high flows. Peak flows have occurred, but forecast flows are expected to remain near flood stage through early Thursday afternoon, June 8, 2023. For the Sevier River...including Hatch...Minor flooding is forecast to continue. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast, though flows are expected to continue to gradually decrease. * WHERE...Sevier River Near Hatch. * WHEN...Until early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 3.9 feet (1046 cfs), minor flooding will affect fields. Assorted bridges and select low lying structures will receive minor flood damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM MDT Friday the stage was 3.8 feet (1000 CFS). - Forecast...The river will oscillate near flood stage through early afternoon Thursday, June 8 with a maximum value of 3.8 feet (1000 CFS) once again early Saturday morning. - Minor flood stage is 3.9 feet (1040 cfs). &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday afternoon at 1200 PM MDT.
